channel.title: I AM (dirty) - SWIM aka Aevus aka The Sun Cult
channel.description:
[~I AM (dirty)~ By SWIM](https://m.soundcloud.com/user-549511303/i-am-dirty-by-swim)
Hi. I’m SWIM. All songs from The Perfect Title page linked above were written and produced from within Auxy. Great App guys. Love what you’re doing with it too. Keep up the good work!
I’m new here so if im not doing thing correctly please let me know. Thanks, and enjoy!![image|690x425](upload://gLGun0c4RwHt5Ic02XmS74tL3zp.jpeg)

item.title: I AM (dirty) - SWIM aka Aevus aka The Sun Cult
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Love it.

I don’t think it needs more layers. It feels like it could work well with a vocal.
(It feels like good minimal, synth-pop writing and production. Listen to some Banks or Purity Ring instrumentals, and you’ll get my point immediately.)

I even like the extended name. Fussy, but interesting to be so verbose.

Anyhoo, Liked, Reposted and Followed.

I’ll def be checking out your other stuff.

 
(Only criticism…
Not a fan of the Hour melody. Feels a little loose + Hour is such a done to death sound, it detracted from an otherwise great piece of writing, imo.)

Read full topic
item.source: I AM (dirty) - SWIM aka Aevus aka The Sun Cult

item.title: I AM (dirty) - SWIM aka Aevus aka The Sun Cult

item.description:
Good song, I’d say more layers

Why so many names? Keep it simple!
